first_translate: I thought I was going to die from boredom while waiting for you.
but may I ask who you are?
do you really not know who I am?
no, so tell me your name already.

hangle: 대신 죽은 땅에서 도움이 될 만한 똥개를 하나 보내마.
first_translate: if anything happens, send someone useful instead of some useless mutt.

hangle: 아벨 자식… 날 대체 뭐라고 소개한 거야.
first_translate: abel! what exactly did you write in that letter?
a real dog would’ve been more helpful than him...
it just came back to me!
in the original story, there was a character called “the king of mercenaries.”
though his role wasn’t very significant.

hangle: 굳이 따지자면 조연과 서브남의 중간 정도.
first_translate: to put it simply, he was somewhere between a supporting character and a minor male lead.

hangle: 잠시간 유니스의 호위를 맡다가 사랑에 빠졌던가.
first_translate: for a short period of time, he worked as eunice’s bodyguard before falling in love with her.

hangle: 이 타이밍에 권터와 만나게 될 줄은 몰랐네?
first_translate: ...I didn’t think we’d meet at this point in time.
lady fiona, I know who you are.

hangle: 몇 년 전에 헤일론에 잠깐 있었던 적이 있거든.
first_translate: some years ago, I spent some time at house halyeon.

hangle: 유감스럽게도 아가씨는 나에 대한 소문조차 못 들은 모양이지만.
first_translate: unfortunately, lady fiona doesn’t seem to care much about gossip.
rumors don’t interest me all that much...
why are you sweating like crazy?
did you run over here or something?
there could’ve been weirdos lurking around.
you must be one lucky bastard, siegren.
the duke threatened me into coming here anyway...
lady fiona, if you don’t need me anymore,

hangle: 이번에 황궁에서 죽은 땅에 가라고 했거든.
first_translate: the royal palace ordered us to go to the land of death.

hangle: 내가 헤일론 기사와 병사를 빼가면 그만큼 저택 경비에 구멍이 생기잖아.
first_translate: but taking knights and soldiers away from halyeon will leave our estate vulnerable.
the land of death? why are you heading there?
at the time, I had no idea...
...would volunteer himself to become commander-in-chief of the troops.
I knew he cared deeply about me,
but I never expected him to actually take action...

hangle: 그나저나, 당신은 후열에 가도 되지 않아?
first_translate: by the way, shouldn’t you be positioned toward the rear?
even though I’m placed near the center due to eunice,
aren’t you supposed to be the king of mercenaries?
I came here as your escort first and foremost.

hangle: 권터, 공작님이 당신을 어떻게 협박했는지 물어도 돼?
first_translate: gunter, may I ask how the duke blackmailed you?
let's just say I killed a nobleman once.
and the duke helped cover up the incident.
if I were to make excuses,

hangle: 아녀자를 납치해서 끔찍한 짓을 저지른 쓰레기였다.
first_translate: the guy was trash who kidnapped women and committed unspeakable crimes against them.
when the victim tried to kill herself out of despair,

hangle: 아무리 봐도 죽을 사람은 피해자가 아니라 내가 나섰지.
first_translate: I stepped forward since she seemed closer to dying than anyone else.
and then the duke covered everything up?

hangle: 당신이 선택한 일인데 타인의 평가가 필요해?
first_translate: should other people’s opinions matter when you made the decision yourself?
this explains why siegren always acts so nervous around you.

hangle: 황자 전하를 대접하게 되어 무한한 영광입니다.
first_translate: it is an honor to serve prince bernhart.
an honor to meet you, your highness.

hangle: 자, 피곤하실 테니 바로 방으로 안내해드리겠습니다.
…오늘은 피오나와 제대로 대화 한 번 못했군.
first_translate: I couldn’t even talk properly with fiona today...
I guess I'll just have to ask her permission to kiss her.
where might you be headed at such a late hour?
what business do you have with me?
